test_cases.input: User login if credentials valid then grant access else show error
First collect data, then validate the information, finally save to database
Order processing system where customer places order if payment successful then ship product if payment failed then notify customer
Repeat checking status until task is complete
System simultaneously processes payment and validates inventory
Shopping checkout if customer is logged in and has items in cart then proceed to payment else redirect to cart
Data import process checks file format if valid then import data else log error and notify admin
Ticket processing where agent receives ticket if priority is high then assign immediately and notify manager if priority is low then queue for later processing
While there are unprocessed items, process the next item
Login process checks username if valid then check password if password correct then grant access else lock account else show username error
